sen.j: 宇都宮 時綱（うつのみや ときつな）は鎌倉時代中期の鎌倉幕府の御家人。
sen.e: Tokitsuna UTSUNOMIYA was a shogun's retainer of the Kamakura Shogunate in the middle Kamakura period.

sen.j: 宇都宮家の家督は長男の時綱ではなく、北条時政の娘を母とする異母弟の宇都宮泰綱が継いだ。
sen.e: The reign of the UTSUNOMIYA family was not the eldest son Tokitsuna, but it was Yasutsuna UTSUNOMIYA, his half brother with a different mother who was the daughter of Tokimasa HOJO.

sen.e: The reigns of the UTSUNOMIYA family were succeeded by not the first son Tokitsuna but Yasutsuna UTSUNOMIYA, his half brother with a different mother who was the daughter of Tokimasa HOJO.

sen.j: 時綱は三浦義村の娘を室に迎えて三浦氏との関係を深め、美作国守となる。
sen.e: Tokitsuna received the daughter of Yoshimura MIURA as his wife, deepened his relation with the MIURA family and became Mimasaka no kuni no kami.

sen.j: 妻の兄弟である三浦泰村と執権北条時頼との対立宝治合戦で時綱は三浦陣営として戦った。
sen.e: In the confrontation during the Battle of Hoji against Yasumura MIURA who was brother of his wife and and the regent Tokiyori HOJO, Tokitsuna fought as a Miura camp.

sen.j: 敗れた後に源頼朝の法華堂において子の時村、泰親と共に自害した。
sen.e: After being defeated, he committed suicide in MINAMOTO no Yoritomo Hokke-do Hall with his children Tokimura and Yasuchika.
